item.title: Icon Composer
item.description: Icon Composer lets you create layered icons out of Liquid Glass from a single design for iPhone, iPad, Mac, and Apple¬†Watch. With a new multi-layer icon format, you can easily adjust Liquid¬†Glass properties, preview with dynamic lighting effects, and annotate across appearance modes. Icon¬†Composer is designed to work seamlessly with Xcode, and also provides the option to export a flattened version of your icon for marketing and communication¬†needs.
